column1: eject the Defendant in terms of the Conditional Transfer [P2] and the Defendant is entitled to get
back the payment which he paid to the Plaintiff with interest at the rate of 36%.

column2: n  view  of  the  aforesaid  reasons,  I  hold  that  the  Plaintiff-Respondent  is  entitled  to  sue  the
ence, we see no reason for us to interfere with the Judgment of the learned District Judge dated

column1: 13.12.2000 and we affirm the same. Therefore, the appeal is dismissed with tax cost.
